title: Noun collection 1
sentences: I need to buy a new suitcase for my trip.
Where did you leave the car keys?
I put my phone on top of the table.
cruza el río hacia el otro lado.
The bridge crosses the river to the other side.
Do you have a pen to write a note?
Tomorrow I'm going to the library to study a bit.
I like looking at the landscape from the train window.
de esta calle es muy peligrosa.
The corner of this street is very dangerous.
Can you close the door please?
There are many people at today's concert.
marca las tres de la tarde.
The clock marks three in the afternoon.
My wallet is empty, I don't have money.
Do you want a glass of cold water?
de la habitación es muy brillante.
The light in the room is very bright.
I'm looking for my umbrella because it's raining.
The floor is wet, be careful.
What is inside that cardboard box?
I have a map to find the way.
de mi cuarto es de color azul.
The wall of my room is blue.
Can you lend me your notebook to copy the homework?
muy grande delante de mi casa.
There is a very big tree in front of my house.
está abierta y entra aire fresco.
The window is open and fresh air is coming in.
en el quiosco de la plaza.
I bought a magazine at the kiosk in the square.
The path to the village is very long.
dictionary:
La maleta - The suitcase
La llave - The key
El bolígrafo - The pen
La esquina - The corner
La cartera - The wallet
El vaso - The glass
El paraguas - The umbrella
El suelo - The floor
La caja - The box
El espejo - The mirror
